references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced NeRF, a foundational work in neural radiance fields that significantly influenced the development of 3D Gaussian Splatting and related methods.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), a crucial technique that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Ref-nerf: Structured view-dependent appearance for neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduced Ref-NeRF, which is relevant to the current work because it incorporated view-dependent effects into neural radiance fields, a concept that is partially adopted in this work.

references.paper_title: Sugar: Surface-aligned gaussian splatting for efficient 3d mesh reconstruction and high-quality mesh rendering
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it also focuses on improving geometry quality in 3D Gaussian Splatting, addressing a similar challenge to the current work.

references.paper_title: Spec-gaussian: Anisotropic view-dependent appearance for 3d gaussian splatting
references.reason: This paper is important because it directly addresses appearance modeling within 3D Gaussian Splatting, which is closely related to the focus of the current paper.
